xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
### Missing: ring.title=Knowledge Ring Application ### Missing: ring.about=The Knowledge Ring Application allows to draw relations between wiki pages. For instance, the relation //has author// can be created to state that page //The Jungle Book// has relation //has author// with page //Rudyard Kipling//. Relations are stored in the wiki as any other page, with the only specificity that they have relation //is a// with the //Relation// page. The connections of each wiki page can be browsed using a widget showing up under each page title, allowing also to add new connections. ### Missing: ring.quick-links=Documentation and quick links ### Missing: ring.documentation=Documentation ### Missing: ring.demo=Demo ### Missing: ring.search=Search ### Missing: ring.administration=Administration ### Missing: ring.types=Types ### Missing: ring.relations=Relations ### Missing: ring.filter=Filter
### Missing: ring.settings.title=Settings ### Missing: Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_spacesIn=Included spaces ### Missing: Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_spacesIn.hint=List of spaces where the application will be activated (separator: comma), e.g.: Main, XWiki ### Missing: Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_spacesOut=Excluded spaces ### Missing: Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_spacesOut.hint=List of spaces where the application will not be activated (separator: comma) ### Missing: Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_pagesOut=Excluded pages ### Missing: Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_pagesOut.hint=List of pages where the application will not be activated (separator: comma), e.g.: Main.WebHome, XWiki.WebHome ### Missing: Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_termSheet=Term sheet ### Missing: Ring.Code.ConfigurationClass_termSheet.hint=Sheet to be used to display the pages containing at least one ring
